name: 2022 3rd International Conference on Power, Energy and Electrical Engineering
content: Conference Proceedings: After a careful reviewing process, accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the special issue of 2022 3rd International Conference on Power, Energy and Electrical Engineering (PEEE 2022) with Energy Reports. Impact factor: 6.87, CiteScore: 2.7 Abstracting and Indexing: Science Citation Index Expanded (SCIE), Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ), Ei Compendex, Scopus, INSPEC. PEEE 2019\~2020 were indexed by Ei-Compendex & Scopus.
